main event: An observer noted four silver discs hovering by the wings of an aircraft in New Orleans, LA.
interesting points: The objects were observed to stay with the aircraft and made a turn at one point., New Orleans airport confirmed a National Airlines aircraft landing at the time of the sighting., No crew members or passengers aboard noticed anything unusual., The sighting lasted for an undetermined time before the objects dropped out of sight., The conclusion suggested that the aircraft engine exhaust might have been responsible for the sighting.
sighted object: four silver discs in the sky
witness description: civilian, electronics engineer for Boeing aircraft, age not reported
